meanings.definition: A person filled with excessive and single-minded zeal, especially for an extreme religious or political cause.
meanings.sent1: The sports fanatic never missed a game, always cheering loudly for his team.
meanings.sent2: She was a fanatic about recycling, making sure to separate all the materials properly.
meanings.sent3: The fanatic for healthy eating brought kale chips to the movie night.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was so strong, she was a fanatic about planting new flowers every week.
meanings.sent5: The music fanatic had a collection of vinyl records from the 70s and 80s.

meanings.definition: A person with an obsessive interest in and enthusiasm for a particular activity or thing.
meanings.sent1: The gaming fanatic spent hours each day playing his favorite video game.
meanings.sent2: She was a fanatic for fashion, always keeping up with the latest trends.
meanings.sent3: The coffee fanatic had a special mug for each day of the week.
meanings.sent4: His passion for photography made him a fanatic about capturing every moment.
meanings.sent5: The book fanatic had a library filled with novels from different genres.
